statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT block_id, sender_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT MAX(amount), MIN(amount), AVG(amount) FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'abc123' AND receiver_address = 'def456';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT block_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY block_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM restricted_view_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address='Alice' AND receiver_address='Bob';
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY sender_address, receiver_address HAVING total_amount >= 500;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'alice' AND receiver_address = 'bob';
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address IN ('alice', 'john') ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM restricted_view_transactions WHERE amount < 50 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE from_address = '0x123456';
SELECT transaction_id, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, amount FROM privileged_transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE action LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE to_address = 'Alice' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, access_level, role FROM user_access WHERE access_level = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE access_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT view_id, view_name FROM transaction_views WHERE LENGTH(view_name) < 10 ORDER BY view_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x3B8f6a56D8739043C27cdc0F229e4Ae19';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT * FROM user_access WHERE access_level = 'admin' AND role = 'superuser';
SELECT view_name, view_query FROM transaction_views WHERE view_id = '044a013c-0e7b-4f30-af4b-7ac54bfd7508';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM blockchain_users ORDER BY user_name ASC
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT organization_name, organization_type FROM blockchain_organizations
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x1A2B3C' OR receiver_address = '0x4D5E6F'
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM blockchain_users WHERE user_role = 'admin'
SELECT organization_name, organization_type FROM blockchain_organizations WHERE organization_type = 'public' ORDER BY organization_name ASC
SELECT view_name, view_query FROM blockchain_views
